analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/15/0xa4f267b2bf5c47873ec85cb55749368bc15ec2ec.sol:
	Contract Energy27Token has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/15/0xa4f267b2bf5c47873ec85cb55749368bc15ec2ec.sol#216)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/15/0xa4f267b2bf5c47873ec85cb55749368bc15ec2ec.sol#86) is not in mixedCase
